desc: AALamps.com is your North American source for Photron PTY. hollow cathode lamps, super lamps, deuterium lamps, power supplies, graphite furnace components and other specialty manufactured light sources. We also offer a range of complimentary products including autosampler tubes, pump tubing and dispensers!

layout.text: AA Lamps for various AAS Instruments including PerkinElmer, Varian, Agilent, GBC Scientific, Analytic Jena, Thermo & Unicam
P800C Series for Agilent / GBC Scientific / Varian AAS Instruments
P900LL Series for PerkinElmer AAnalyst Instruments
